Issue.creator: scottz
Issue.summary: fabric-test 12hr test says PASSED when tx failures occurred
Issue.description: The test results in the pteReport log file summary should not say PASSED when there are failures in this line such as:`CONSTANT INVOKE Overall failures: proposal 41932 transactions 2`. We need to add an assertion in 12HrTest.py that checks for the string in the output `Overall failures: proposal 0 transactions 0` or else the test should fail.
